segments.text: I keep watching the woman at the sink, utterly mesmerized by her obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate, as if nothing else exists in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are neat, contrasting with the spreading wetness beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly astonishes me that she hasn't sensed the water on her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of the running water and its overflow must be significant, yet she remains unperturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused, almost like she's in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what her reaction will be when she finally looks down or turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to be a rude awakening, a sudden splash of reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of her surprise almost makes me chuckle, but the potential mess dampens that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll probably be quite upset about the water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocence of her current state makes the impending discovery even more impactful.
segments.speaker: PAR
